translation.en: -Hello? -Sonny, it's your dad. You asleep?
No. Hey, man. I was exercising.
-Bullshit. You were sleeping. -I wasn't.
This kid won't stop lying to me. You still act like you're 6.
translation.es: Este niño todavía me miente. Es como si aún tuvieras 6 años.

translation.en: Yeah, okay, Dad. I act like I'm 6.
Found a job yet where you work more than one day a week?
translation.es: ¿Encontraste un trabajo de más de un día a la semana?

translation.en: I've been looking.
Looking won't pay the rent.
All the money I won from the cab accident...
...is kicking ass in the stock market, so relax.
translation.es: ...está rompiendo bolas en el mercado. Cálmate.

translation.en: -Don't blow it on worthless crap. -I won't.
translation.es: -No lo tires en tonterías. -No lo haré.

translation.en: You should spend it on your bar exam.
translation.es: ¿Sabes en qué gastarlo? En tu examen de abogado.

translation.en: You're the lawyer. I ain't taking a bar exam.
translation.es: Tú eres el abogado de la familia. Yo no haré ese examen.

translation.en: I got too much other shit going on.
I don't know what happened to you.
translation.es: No sé qué demonios te pasó.

translation.en: How're things going with your girlfriend, Vanessa?
translation.es: ¿Cómo vas con tu novia? ¿Cómo se llama? Vanessa.

translation.en: Things are going fine.
Shit!
I gotta go.
Shit! You turned off the alarm clock again.
No! I mean, yes, I did, but I thought you needed more sleep.
translation.es: ¡No! Digo, sí, pero creía que necesitabas dormir más.

translation.en: I shouldn't have stayed here. That was a jerk thing to do.
translation.es: No debería haberme quedado. Cómo se te ocurre. Gracias.

translation.en: Why are you going to work? It's Sunday.
I'm not going to work. I'm going to brunch with potential clients.
translation.es: No voy a trabajar. Voy a comer con clientes potenciales.

translation.en: That's how a party planner gets business, by making contacts.
translation.es: Así consigue clientes un planeador de fiestas, conociendo gente.

translation.en: Meet with me. I'll order in from Cozy's. We'll have fun.
translation.es: Conóceme a mí. Pediré comida a Cozy's. Nos divertiremos.

translation.en: I am sick of Cozy's. You order in from there all the time.
translation.es: Ya me harté de Cozy's. Siempre pides de ahí.

translation.en: The delivery guy's your best friend.
translation.es: El repartidor ya es tu gran amigo.

translation.en: He happens to be pretty damn nice.
This is a rough patch in my life.
translation.es: Éste es un momento duro en mi vida.

translation.en: Syracuse is 0 and 3. And I got those medical problems.
translation.es: Syracuse va 0-3. Y tengo mis problemas médicos.

translation.en: Medical problems?
A cab runs over your foot two years ago. You're hospitalized one night.
translation.es: Un taxi te atropella el pie hace 2 años. Te hospitalizan una noche.

translation.en: First of all, that cab was huge.
And a jury decided that one night of pain was worth $200,000.
translation.es: Y un jurado decidió que una noche de dolor valía $200 mil.

translation.en: -So there you go. -Whatever.
Why are you being so nuts to me lately?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me has estado tratando tan mal?

translation.en: You refuse to move on to the next phase.
translation.es: Porque no deseas pasar a la siguiente fase de tu vida.

translation.en: I'd like to have a family someday.
translation.es: Yo quisiera tener familia algún día.

translation.en: I need someone I can rely on, not a playmate.
translation.es: Pero necesito a alguien en quien pueda confiar.

translation.en: You need a father figure? "Stop pulling your sister's hair!"
translation.es: ¿Necesitas una figura paterna? ¡No patees a tu hermana!

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna go to Syracuse to see my mom.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Voy a ir a Syracuse a ver a mi mamá.

translation.en: -I'll be back on Wednesday. -What are you talking about?
I had call for delivery, but it was crank call. You want chocolate cake?
translation.es: Tuve llamada de entrega al edificio, creo que de broma. ¿Quieren pastel?

translation.en: Come back later. I'll Indian wrestle you.
translation.es: Regresa luego. Hacemos lucha de manos.

translation.en: You're going down, sucker.
We'll see about that.
Okay. Peace, out.
You're going to Syracuse?
I need time to think and so do you.
Think about what?
Your life and why I should be a part of it.
translation.es: Sobre tu vida y por qué debo estar en ella.

translation.en: -All right. -While you're at it...
translation.es: Bueno. Y además, piensa en conseguir un trabajo de verdad.

translation.en: ...think about getting a real job.
translation.es: Y además, piensa en conseguir un trabajo de verdad.

translation.en: I got a real job!
Patrick Ewing, nice shot.
-Hey, Sonny. -What's up, buddy boy?
I'm out the door. Hey, pal.
translation.es: Sí, ya me voy de aquí. Hola, amigo.

translation.en: -Where you going? -Manhattan.
You wanna take me with you?
All right, I guess.
Hold on to your money. Later on.
Okay, take care, Sonny.
See you.
Cadillac, I love it.
Surprise!
Just ignore him.
It's only Sonny. It's only Sonny.
translation.es: Sólo es Sonny. Sólo es Sonny.

translation.en: Yeah, it's only me. It's only me.
translation.es: Sí, sólo soy yo. Sólo soy yo.

translation.en: -What's going on? -Corinne's going-away party for Kevin.
She didn't tell me. The roommate has a right to know.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dijo Corinne? Tengo derecho a saber.

translation.en: She knew you'd ruin the surprise.
translation.es: Porque sabía que arruinarías la sorpresa.

translation.en: No, I wouldn't.
Hey, surprise.
Surprise.
What's going on?
We wasted the good surprise on you.
translation.es: Desperdiciamos el grito bueno en ti.

translation.en: All right.
Is this your handiwork?
I guess.
See you in three hours.
Good to see you stiffs. What've you been doing?
Last three weeks have been crazy. I've been in Denver, Dallas--
translation.es: He estado loco en el trabajo. Fui a Denver, Dallas, San Francisco.

translation.en: I'm sleeping in the office. We're going to trial on the fraud case.
translation.es: Yo he dormido en la oficina. Nos vamos a juicio en un caso de fraude.

translation.en: Honey, it was a great surprise. I was totally shocked.
translation.es: Corazón, fue una linda sorpresa. Me dejaste anonadado.

translation.en: No, you weren't! And I worked so hard on this.
translation.es: ¡No es cierto! Y trabajé tan duro en esto.

translation.en: Need some help?
-Honey, your sister's here. -Hey, sweetie.
I hate Sonny.
My client's out $7 million. All we can sue on is breach of contract.
translation.es: Mi cliente pierde $7 millones y sólo hay violación de contrato.

translation.en: Maybe you can sue under the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.
translation.es: Demándalos con la Ley de Prácticas Extranjeras Corruptas.

translation.en: I gotta get back to the office. You're the king.
translation.es: Voy a la oficina. Sonny. Eres el rey.

translation.en: Mikey, a pleasure.
-I'll see you at home. -All right.
I'll walk you out.
I gotta admit, I'm still weirded out when they kiss.
translation.es: Debo admitir que aún me da no sé qué cuando se besan.

translation.en: Why? They're gay. That's what gay guys do.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Son gay. Eso hacen los tipos gay.

translation.en: I know, but they were like brothers to us back in school.
translation.es: Sí, ya lo sé, pero éramos como hermanos en la uni.

translation.en: They're still like our brothers. Our very, very gay brothers.
translation.es: Siguen siendo como nuestros hermanos, nuestros hermanos muy gay.

translation.en: What are you doing after this? Going to a Klan meeting?
translation.es: ¿Después de esto vas a ir a una junta del Ku Klux Klan?

translation.en: Remember when Dad had that barbecue... ...for his friends and it rained...
translation.es: ¿Te acuerdas cuando papá hizo un asado para amigos del trabajo y llovió...

translation.en: ...so he and Mom went into the kitchen and made...
translation.es: ...y él y mamá se metieron a hacer como...

translation.en: ...100 hamburgers with one frying pan?
You're not gonna let a little rain stop you from making 100 hamburgers.
translation.es: No vas a dejar que una lluvia te impida hacer 100 hamburguesas.

translation.en: That relationship's lasted longer than I thought it would.
translation.es: Esa relación ha durado más de lo que esperaba.

translation.en: Look at his eyes. He's bored. I give it two more weeks.
translation.es: Pero mira los ojos de él. Está aburrido. Les doy 2 semanas.

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Everybody!
I'm sorry. I wanted to thank you for coming tonight.
translation.es: Disculpen. Quería agradecerles a todos por haber venido hoy.

translation.en: I guess I should say--
I'm getting it. Tomorrow I'm leaving for China...
translation.es: Estoy aprendiendo. Mañana me voy a China, representando a la firma de Morton y Mandel.

translation.en: ...to represent the firm of Morton and Mandel.
translation.es: Mañana me voy a China, representando a la firma de Morton y Mandel.

translation.en: Me, the same guy who once shaved his ass to win a $5 bet.
translation.es: Yo, que una vez me afeité el trasero por una apuesta de $5.

translation.en: Prove it!
Just kidding.
But I am real glad you're all here tonight, because...
translation.es: Pero me da mucho gusto que estén aquí hoy porque...

translation.en: ...I'm gonna do what I never thought I'd have the guts to do.
translation.es: ...voy a hacer algo que nunca creí tener el valor de hacer.

translation.en: You're not proposing, are you?
-Yeah, pal, I am. -Well, think about it, you know?
translation.es: Sí, eso mismo. Pero piénsalo antes, ¿no?

translation.en: God, Sonny, shut up!
Anyway, will you?
Good call on the two weeks.
Sonny, what was that all about?
Congratulations. You and Big Boobs McGee are gonna be happy.
translation.es: Felicidades. Tú y Pechugas McGee serán muy felices.

translation.en: Don't call her that.
You wanna tell your children you met their mother as a waitress at Hooters?
translation.es: ¿Le dirás a tus hijos que conociste a mamá de mesera en Melones?

translation.en: Sonny, that was five years ago. She's a doctor now...
translation.es: Sonny, eso fue hace 5 años. Ahora ya es doctora...

translation.en: ...and my fiancée, so from now on...
translation.es: ...y mi prometida, así que en adelante...

translation.en: ...Dr. Big Boobs McGee.
-Congratulations. -Thanks, man.
I just...
...got shit going on.
What's the matter?
Vanessa's gonna break up with me...
translation.es: Vanessa va a romper conmigo y...

translation.en: ...and I don't know how to make her wanna stay.
translation.es: ...no sé qué hacer para que quiera quedarse.

translation.en: She's getting older. She wants different things.
translation.es: Vanessa está madurando, quiere otras cosas.

translation.en: Career, stable relationship, a family.
translation.es: Una carrera, una relación estable, una familia.

translation.en: That's how they get.
I want things to go back to the way they used to be.
translation.es: Yo sólo quiero que las cosas sean como antes.

translation.en: When we were at Syracuse, and Vanessa worshiped you.
translation.es: Como en Syracuse, cuando Vanessa te veneraba.

translation.en: -That was nice. -Nobody hassled you to get a job.
translation.es: Nadie te daba lata para que trabajaras.

translation.en: Tommy and Phil showered separately.
translation.es: Tommy y Phil se duchaban separados.

translation.en: Those were the days.
-What're you doing? -If I make this...
...Vanessa will realize she likes me the way I am.
translation.es: ...Vanessa verá que me quiere tal como soy.

translation.en: You're going to the putt.
translation.es: Te dispones a hacer el putt.

translation.en: Remember, the roof breaks to the right.
translation.es: El techo se quiebra a la derecha.

translation.en: Yes! That's what I'm talk--
Good God!
That can't be good.
Where's Kevin?
He already left. I guess he forgot to say goodbye to you.
translation.es: Ya se fue. Supongo que olvidó despedirse de ti.

translation.en: -Why are you here? -I'm cleaning because you're useless.
translation.es: -¿Y qué haces tú aquí? -Limpiar. Tú eres un inútil.

translation.en: Then what, you gonna go to your Hooters reunion?
translation.es: ¿Entonces, qué, vas a ir a tu reunión de Melones?

translation.en: You guys talk about whose ass hangs out of their shorts the most?
translation.es: ¿Charlarán de a quién se le sale más el trasero de los shorts?

translation.en: At least I can fit my ass in my shorts, fatty.
translation.es: Al menos yo quepo en mis shorts, gordinflas.

translation.en: Speaking of fatty, whose is this?
-I don't know. -I'm eating it then.
"We wasted the good surprise on you."
translation.es: Desperdiciamos el grito bueno en ti.

translation.en: Lady gave me $5 to bring him here.
translation.es: Una señora me dio $5 por traer esto.

translation.en: -What do you mean? -Later.
Are you selling raffle tickets?
Oh, boy.
-Kevin Gerrity. -I got something to tell you.
-What's up? -There's a kid here.
What kind of kid?
If this note is true, it's your kid.
translation.es: Según esta nota, es tu hijo.

translation.en: What do you mean?
I'm having a tough time reading this...
translation.es: Me cuesta trabajo leer esto, pero...

translation.en: ...but it says, "Dear Kevin: This is Julian, your son.
translation.es: ...dice: Querido Kevin: Éste es Julián, tu hijo.

translation.en: I hope you understand why I didn't tell you until now...
translation.es: Ojalá entiendas por qué no te había hablado de él...

translation.en: ...but he needs your help. I can't be his mother anymore."
translation.es: ...pero necesita tu ayuda. Yo ya no puedo ser su mami.

translation.en: -This is ridiculous. -Hang on.
Who's this?
This is my friend.
-Is that Kevin on the phone? -No, it's my Uncle Remus.
Hi. What's your name?
Is he all right?
He doesn't like you. Leave us alone.
translation.es: Sí, pero no le gustas. Déjanos solos.

translation.en: You're such a dick.
That was your girlfriend. She was acting "Hooterific."
translation.es: Ésa era tu novia. Portándose muy Conífica otra vez.

translation.en: -Who sent that note? -"Jan."
Jan.... I don't know any Jan.
-Where's he from? -Where are you from?
Buffalo.
I've never even been to Buffalo.
translation.es: Búfalo. Nunca he ido a Búfalo.

translation.en: Maybe it's a mistake.
Is this like the time you said my parents were dead?
translation.es: ¿El niño existe o es como cuando dijiste que murieron mis papás?

translation.en: I swear, he's right here.
I'm coming home. I don't know what I'll say--
translation.es: Voy para allá. No sé cómo explicaré esto a la--

translation.en: Hang on. It says...
..."If you won't take responsibility for him, they found a foster family--"
translation.es: Si no tomas responsabilidad por él, ellos tienen una familia adoptiva--

translation.en: Yes, Uncle Remus, I know the catfish are huge.
translation.es: Sí, tío Remus, ya sé que los peces son enormes.

translation.en: That's terrific.
Here's a number for a guy...
translation.es: Aquí está el número de un tipo de...

translation.en: ...at City Social Service. Arthur Brooks. I'll call.
translation.es: ...Servicios Sociales, Arthur Brooks. Yo le llamo.

translation.en: -I'll come home. -I'll take care of it.
translation.es: -Voy para allá. -No, no, yo me encargo.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Yeah, don't worry.
Hooters. Hooters. Hooters!
-All right. Thanks a lot. -Later.
I'm gonna make another phone call.
You want to come and sit down, pal?
Or you can stand there. Anything you want. I'll be a minute.
translation.es: O te puedes quedar ahí parado. Como tú quieras. No tardaré.

translation.en: Social Services is closed today, Columbus Day.
translation.es: Servicios Sociales está cerrado por ser el Día de la Raza.

translation.en: We'll be open tomorrow at 8 a.m.
translation.es: Abriremos de nuevo mañana, a las 8 a.m.

translation.en: Columbus Day.
Boy, I don't know what to tell you.
translation.es: Caray, no sé qué decirte, amigo.

translation.en: Everything's gonna get figured out tomorrow.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Mañana se arregla esto.

translation.en: Can you be a tough little guy until then?
Great.
Do I need to get you a bottle of formula or something?
translation.es: ¿Necesitas una botella de fórmula o algo?

translation.en: -No. -What do you eat?
translation.es: ¿Necesitas una botella de fórmula o algo? ¿Qué comes?

translation.en: Food.
Yeah? I eat food too.
What--? Come on.
You need me to hold your hand?
translation.es: ¿Necesitas que te tome de la mano?

translation.en: On Mondays, I go to Central Park and watch rollerbladers fall down.
translation.es: Los lunes voy al parque a ver cómo se caen los patinadores.

translation.en: -You into that? -I don't know.
Watch. This guy's humming.
He's going down, he's going down, he's going--!
translation.es: Se va a caer. Se va a caer, ¡va para abajo--!

translation.en: How old are you, anyways?
-Five. -Five?
You wear a diaper?
-You wipe your own ass then? -Yes.
You do? Good job. That's cool.
Come on, fall down. Fall down. Yes! Come on, damn it.
translation.es: Vamos, cáete. Cáete. ¡Eso es! Vamos, maldita sea.

translation.en: You suck. You suck!
Check this out.
My God!
There's a stick there. Somebody should move it.
translation.es: Hay un palo ahí. Alguien debería quitarlo.

translation.en: All right now, what way would you put that on?
This Columbo, he pretends to be stupid...
translation.es: Este Columbo, finge que es estúpido...

translation.en: ...but he's really smart as a tack.
Oh, yeah, he is.
I wipe my own ass.
translation.es: Yo me limpio mi propio culito.

translation.en: Me too.
So, Mr. Ass Wiper, what's this guy's name?
translation.es: A ver, Don Limpia Culitos, ¿cómo se llama este tipo?

translation.en: Scuba Steve.
Does he ever take his flippers off?
translation.es: Me gustan sus aletas. ¿Se las quita?

translation.en: What if he goes bowling?
translation.es: ¿Si va a jugar a los bolos?

translation.en: They don't make him wear bowling shoes? He wears flippers?
translation.es: ¿No lo hacen usar zapatos de bolos? ¿Usa las aletas?

translation.en: -Really? -I had a doll like that at one time.
translation.es: ¿De veras? Yo tenía un muñeco como ése, una vez.

translation.en: But my cat, he bite his head off.
translation.es: Pero mi gato le arrancó la cabeza.

translation.en: What cat would do that?
You calling me a liar?
Hey, take it easy.
Anyways...
...Jets are playing tonight.
We're gonna go to the Blarney Stone. Wanna come?
translation.es: Vamos a ir al Blarney Stone. ¿Vienes?

translation.en: I've got more deliveries.
translation.es: Tengo más entregas en la bicicleta.

translation.en: Maybe you can also finish the turkey on your lip.
translation.es: Acábate ese pavo, en tu labio.

translation.en: Right there.
Let's crank up the Styx.
translation.es: Sí, vamos a subirle al Styx.

translation.en: No music during the game.
-It's halftime. Relax, Mr. Herlihy. -Goddamn Jets.
translation.es: -Es medio tiempo. Calma, Sr. Herlihy. -Malditos Jets.

translation.en: What are you doing in here, cutie?
Watching football.
-Who do you want to win? -The goddamn Jets.
translation.es: -¿A quién le apuestas? -A los malditos Jets.

translation.en: Have fun.
Too bad you don't like girls. I think you could've had her.
translation.es: Lástima que no te gusten las chicas. Ésa era tuya.

translation.en: -I'm thirsty. -You're thirsty?
-Are you allowed soda? -I don't know.
My mom always said soda rots your teeth...
translation.es: Mi mamá decía que te pudren los dientes...

translation.en: ...but you'll lose them anyway, so rot on.
translation.es: ...pero igual se te van a caer, que se pudran.

translation.en: -Can we get two root beers? -Sure.
When I graduated law school, we met here every Monday to watch football.
translation.es: Cuando acabé la facultad de leyes, veníamos aquí los lunes a ver fútbol.

translation.en: Who would meet you?
My friends, Vanessa.
Vanessa always rooted against the team... ...I wanted to win just to bust my chops.
translation.es: Vanessa siempre apostaba al rival de mi equipo, sólo para fregarme.

translation.en: But everybody's so busy with their crap lately, no one comes.
translation.es: Pero todos están tan ocupados con sus cosas que ya nadie viene.

translation.en: Like I'm not busy?
Shut up or I'll smack you through the wall like last Monday.
translation.es: Sr. Herlihy, cállese o le pego para que atraviese la pared como el lunes.

translation.en: Last Monday was a fluke. Bring it on, woman.
translation.es: Lo del lunes fue chiripa. Venga, mujer.

translation.en: Anytime.
He drinks a lot of soda.
I'm telling you, buddy. Vanessa, she's the one. I can't lose her.
translation.es: Te digo, camarada, Vanessa es la indicada. No la puedo perder.

translation.en: I'm not getting any handsomer.
translation.es: No me estoy volviendo más guapo.

translation.en: Every day I get a little bit older and balder and fatter.
translation.es: Cada día me vuelvo un poco más viejo y calvo y gordo.

translation.en: -Fatter? -At your age...
translation.es: ¿Gordo? Cuando tenía tu edad, podía comer de todo, no subía ni un gramo.

translation.en: ...I could eat anything. Wouldn't gain an ounce.
translation.es: Cuando tenía tu edad, podía comer de todo, no subía ni un gramo.

translation.en: Now, I have a chocolate shake, my ass jiggles for a week.
translation.es: Ahora, con una leche malteada, el trasero me tiembla 7 días.

translation.en: -Enjoy the metabolism while you got it. -Metalobism?
Good God, it's 2:30 in the morning. You must be wrecked.
translation.es: Dios mío, son las 2:30 a.m. Has de estar frito.

translation.en: Anyways, I had fun today. Did you have fun?
translation.es: En fin, yo me divertí hoy. ¿Tú, te divertiste?

translation.en: Yeah, you're all right.
Have a good one.
Could I have a night-light?
Night-light? I think I can help you out. Hang on.
translation.es: ¿Una luz prendida? Creo que te puedo ayudar. Un momento.

translation.en: Let's see here.
There you go, all right?
Are you my dad?
No, I'm not, but...
...that Dad and Mom thing we'll figure out in the morning.
translation.es: ...todo eso de tu papá y tu mamá lo resolveremos mañana.

translation.en: You just go to sleep.
-Good night. -Good night.
Go get the can, okay?
Go! Go! Go!
I'm thinking about keeping the kid.
translation.es: Estoy pensando en quedarme con el niño.

translation.en: Remember when we went to the pet store...
...and you wanted that puppy, but I reminded you about feeding it...
translation.es: ...de animales y querías un cachorro, pero te dije de alimentarlo...

translation.en: ...cleaning it and toilet training it?
translation.es: ...y limpiarlo y entrenarlo a ir al baño?

translation.en: This is kind of like that, except with a human.
translation.es: Bueno, esto es parecido pero con un ser humano.

translation.en: I mean, I'm glad you had fun and all, but this is big.
translation.es: Digo, me alegro que te hayas divertido, pero esto es algo serio.

translation.en: I gotta do something big. I think Vanessa will respect that.
translation.es: Creo que si hago algo así en mi vida, Vanessa me respetará.

translation.en: You think that since women get pregnant... ...to fix a troubled relationship...
translation.es: Crees que si una mujer puede embarazarse para arreglar una relación...

translation.en: ...why can't a guy adopt a kid to do the same?
translation.es: ...¿por qué no puede un tipo adoptar a un niño?

translation.en: I didn't think of it like that. But yes, that's what I'm thinking.
translation.es: No lo pensé así. Pero sí, es lógico, me parece bien.

translation.en: Sounds nuts to me, pal. Do yourself a favor. Sleep on it.
translation.es: Es una locura. Hazte un favor: consúltalo con la almohada.

translation.en: You're right. Can I use your phone?
Arthur Brooks speaking.
How you doing? Kevin Gerrity.
Right on, Mr. Gerrity.
We were expecting you.
Do you still got a foster family lined up for Julian?
translation.es: Sí. ¿Todavía tienen una familia adoptiva para Julián?

translation.en: Yes, we do.
I've decided to take care of the little guy.
translation.es: Puede cancelarla. He decidido cuidar al niño.

translation.en: Way to sleep on it, pal.
translation.es: Veo que lo consultaste con la almohada.

translation.en: You two want to get married, I support that.
translation.es: Uds. quieren casarse, me parece bien. Pero déjenme en paz.

translation.en: When parents take the responsibility, there's no bigger high for us.
translation.es: Cuando los papás se responsabilizan, es lo máximo para nosotros.

translation.en: I'm psyched about it too.
translation.es: A mí también me encanta la idea.

translation.en: So that's it.
Yep. Good luck to you and your son.
translation.es: Sí, y buena suerte con su hijo.

translation.en: My son.
Goddamn stick!
That's my boy.
Go back to sleep.
Well, I'm going back to sleep. Nighty-night.
translation.es: Yo me voy a volver a dormir. Buenas noches.

translation.en: I wet my bed.
Oh, God.
That's a shitload of piss.
There you go, all right?
No more wet mess.
Sleep, all right? Just try to sleep. Stay asleep.
translation.es: Duérmete, ¿está bien? Sólo trata de dormir. Quédate dormido.

translation.en: Sit still!
Lay!
All right! I'm up!
It smells like urine in this joint. Good job.
translation.es: Huele a orina en este tugurio. Bien hecho.

translation.en: What're you doing there, boy?
Making cereal.
Oh, yeah? Why don't you pour me a bowl?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me preparas un tazón?

translation.en: Or don't pour me a bowl. Either way.
translation.es: O no me lo prepares. Como gustes.

translation.en: I got it. I got it.
translation.es: Yo lo voy a limpiar. Yo lo limpio.

translation.en: We can fix this.
It's not a big deal.
Look. See?
See how quick it goes away?
Crybaby, come on.
Don't worry about it, boy.
Scuba Steve, damn you!
You think that's funny, me getting hurt?
translation.es: ¿Eso te gustó? ¿Te da risa que me lastime?

translation.en: There's a bright side to being up before 11: McDonald's breakfast.
translation.es: La ventaja de levantarse antes de las 11 es poder desayunar en McDonald's.

translation.en: I haven't been up for that in 10 years. You wanna go?
translation.es: Hace 10 años que no me levanto a tiempo para eso. ¿Vamos?

translation.en: Tie your shoes, we'll go. Hurry.
It's like 12 blocks from here, so tie quickly.
translation.es: Está como a 12 cuadras, así que apúrate.

translation.en: Do you need help with that?
I can do it.
Let me do it.
You loop it, you swoop it, and you pull.
You loop it, you swoop it, you pull.
Good. Let's go. We're in a hurry.
It's different for your generation.
You've always had McDonald's breakfast available.
translation.es: Uds. siempre han tenido el desayuno de McDonald's a su disposición.

translation.en: I have?
When I was born, all we had were the burgers and fries.
translation.es: Cuando yo nací sólo teníamos las hamburguesas y las papas.

translation.en: Maybe the fish sandwich. I'm not sure. I'll get back to you.
translation.es: No sé si el sándwich de pescado. Luego te aviso.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Oh, yeah, the hand-holding thing.
translation.es: Sí, lo de agarrarse de la mano.

translation.en: My dad took us to McDonald's the first morning they had breakfast.
translation.es: Mi papá nos llevó a McDonald's la primera mañana que lo ofrecieron.

translation.en: Everybody was baffled. "Are these sausages or hamburgers?"
translation.es: Todos estaban perplejos: ¿Es salchichón o hamburguesa?

translation.en: I have to go to the bathroom.
We're gonna be there in a minute.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Ya vamos a llegar, en un minuto.

translation.en: I gotta go now.
Didn't you pee enough in bed?
We only got nine minutes to get there.
translation.es: Sólo tenemos nueve minutos para llegar.

translation.en: But I gotta go to the bathroom.
translation.es: Pero yo tengo que ir al baño.

translation.en: All right, let's go.
Can my kid use the bathroom for a minute?
translation.es: ¿Puede usar mi hijo tu baño un minuto?

translation.en: Customers only.
He's just a kid. We'll be in and out.
translation.es: Es un niño. Vamos a entrar y salir.

translation.en: That's not my problem.
It's not your problem? All right.
Come on.
Here you are. Your waiter will be right with you.
translation.es: Ahí tiene. Su mesero estará con usted en un instante.

translation.en: I can't do it.
What do you mean, you can't do it? Just go.
translation.es: ¿Cómo que no puedes? Haz y ya.

translation.en: I'm scared. Could you do it too?
translation.es: Tengo miedo. ¿No puedes hacer tú también?

translation.en: All right.
Here we go.
And we're off.
That's not too difficult, right?
And we're both losing weight.
Good job. We're gonna miss breakfast. Let's go.
translation.es: Buen trabajo. Se nos va el desayuno.

translation.en: Put it away.
-Thanks, anyways. -Sure thing. Anytime.
Move your ass there, pee-boy.
translation.es: Vamos, mueve ese culito, niño pipión.

translation.en: We only got five minutes, five minutes. Now four.
Come on. We're almost there.
translation.es: Ya casi llegamos. Ya casi llegamos.

translation.en: Hey, mister. Why are you sitting on the ground?
translation.es: ¿Por qué está sentado en el piso?

translation.en: This is where I live.
-We gotta get going. -Why?
In retrospect, I made some bad choices after high school.
translation.es: Porque tomé unas decisiones erróneas después del bachillerato.

translation.en: -We gotta get going. -Why?
This was during the so-called Disco Era...
translation.es: Era la época de la música disco...

translation.en: ...but for me, it was more the Doing Mushrooms Era.
translation.es: ...pero para mí, era más bien la Época de Saborear Hongos.

translation.en: -We're gonna miss breakfast. -Why?
I never thought about that.
I was never Mr. Popularity in high school...
...and I watched Fantasia a lot.
-One day it clicked. -Hey, yappy.
translation.es: Y un día, lo vi claramente.

translation.en: If you end it, you get an Egg McMuffin.
translation.es: Oye, si acabas la conversación te traigo un McMuffin con huevo.

translation.en: How about a Sausage McMuffin with hash browns?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal uno con salchicha y unas papas?

translation.en: You got a deal.
Look, look. He fell asleep. Let's go.
Let's go.
Sausage McMuffin.
Pardon me, sir.
How you doing?
What can I get for you?
-What do you want? -Cheerios.
They don't got Cheerios.
Lasagna.
What's the matter? We'll take hotcakes and sausage.
Sorry. We stopped serving breakfast.
We're four seconds late.
You're 30 minutes and four seconds late. Breakfast stops at 10:30.
translation.es: 30 minutos y 4 segundos. A las 10:30 se acaba.

translation.en: Horseshit!
Don't cry. Sorry.
I was cursing at the lady, not you.
translation.es: No te insulté a ti sino a la chica.

translation.en: Nice parenting.
Thanks. Are you my therapist? Take a walk.
translation.es: Gracias. ¿Es Ud. psicoanalista? Váyase a volar.

translation.en: Do you want a Happy Meal?
You got a Happy Meal?
Will somebody get the kid a Happy Meal?!
Relax.
Where's my Egg McMuffin?
Breakfast is over at 10:30.
translation.es: El desayuno se acaba a las 10:30.

translation.en: -Really? I thought it was 11. -I thought that too.
Total mind blower.
translation.es: Ahora sí que me dejaron alucinado.

translation.en: Will you just relax? Here.
What do you want me to do?
You're gonna meet Vanessa tonight. You'll like her.
translation.es: Vas a conocer hoy a Vanessa. Es linda. Te va a gustar.

translation.en: You wanna see me get hurt? That'll cheer you up?
All right.
You think that's funny?
Good. No more crying.
Are you okay?
Next time, kill me.
Let's do it, Rangers.
--Rangers against the Tampa Bay Lightning.
And at this stage...
...it's as close as you can get to a must-win game for the Rangers.
translation.es: ...éste ya es un juego de importancia crucial para los Rangers.

translation.en: Or they'll fall behind--
-How you doing? -How you doing?
-You like hockey? -You like hockey?
translation.es: ¿Te gusta el hockey? ¿Te gusta el hockey?

translation.en: This is a big, important game.
This is a big, important game.
-Cut the crap. -Cut the crap.
translation.es: Déjate de estupideces. Déjate de estupideces.

translation.en: I'm serious. Don't do that.
I'm serious. Don't do that.
How much wood would a woodchuck chuck... ...if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
translation.es: Tres tristes tigres tragan trigo en un trigal.

translation.en: That's what I thought. Shut up.
Don't you take naps?
Sometimes.
Go take a nap.
I'm too hungry to sleep.
You want some food?
Having a kid is great...
...as long as his eyes are closed and he's not moving or speaking.
translation.es: ...mientras tenga los ojos cerrados y no se mueva ni hable.

translation.en: He's taken down! Penalty shot!
How you doing? You sleepwalking?
Why don't you go back sleepy? Sleepy.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te vuelves a dormir?

translation.en: Keep napping. What's this?
Kangaroo song.
That's terrific. And we'll watch this after the game, okay?
translation.es: Fantástico. Y vamos a ver esto después del juego, ¿sí?

translation.en: But after my nap, I always watch the kangaroo song.
translation.es: Pero después de mi siesta siempre veo la canción del canguro.

translation.en: It's overtime, and there's a penalty shot about to take place.
translation.es: Estamos en tiempos extras y van a tirar un penalty.

translation.en: It happens every 10 years--
Kangaroo song. Kangaroo song!
All right!
God! You were normal yesterday.
I can't take this. Are you serious?
Come and play
What do you say?
Douche-bag kangaroo.
Are you all hopped out?
I don't know what to do. Hopefully Vanessa will.
translation.es: No sé qué hacer. Ojalá Vanessa sepa.

translation.en: I think she's back. If she's not back, we'll wait for her.
translation.es: Creo que ya regresó. Si no ha vuelto, la esperamos.

translation.en: Get your coat. Clean up.
Oh, God. You don't have to pee, do you?
translation.es: Dios mío. No tienes que hacer pipí, ¿verdad?

translation.en: -Do you swear? -I swear.
How come you're not going?
I don't have to go. Only you and my grandfather go every 30 seconds.
translation.es: No tengo que hacer. Sólo tú y mi abuelo hacen cada 30 segundos.

translation.en: Let's hurry it up, all right? I'm keeping you company.
He'll write your name on the wall. Mind your business.
translation.es: ¿Quieren que escriba su nombre en la pared? No se metan.

translation.en: Let's go. Let's go.
Why do I need to meet this lady?
translation.es: ¿Por qué necesito conocer a esa señora?

translation.en: -Now it is your problem. -Thank you.
She's that lady I was telling you about.
translation.es: Ésta es la muchacha de la que te hablé.

translation.en: She's gonna be a big part of your life.
translation.es: Va a ser una parte importante de tu vida.

translation.en: I'm scared. What if she's not nice?
translation.es: Tengo miedo. ¿Qué tal si no es buena persona?

translation.en: Look.
See these right here? These are magic sunglasses, okay?
If you're afraid, put them on to become invisible.
translation.es: Si te los pones, te vuelves invisible.

translation.en: Really? Nobody can see me?
Put them on.
Sonny, I'm right here.
Oh, the glasses. I couldn't see you.
translation.es: Oh, los anteojos. No te podía ver.

translation.en: Keep those on. No one can notice you until you decide they can.
translation.es: No te los quites. Nadie te puede ver hasta que tú lo decidas.

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's go.
I'm still right here.
Okay, all right, the glasses.
Welcome back.
-Who's that? -Who's who? He's invisible.
translation.es: ¿Quién es ése? ¿Quién es quién? Es invisible.

translation.en: -Can I come in? -Sure.
Any invisible people out here...
...feel free to come in, okay?
Sonny, I don't really know what's going on right now.
translation.es: Sonny, no sé qué esté pasando ahora.

translation.en: -We should talk-- -You said I got some thinking to do?
translation.es: -Pero necesitamos hablar de-- -Me dijiste que pensara.

translation.en: So I did it.
Just because I don't have a job doesn't mean I don't wanna move on.
translation.es: No tengo trabajo, pero sí quiero pasar al siguiente nivel.

translation.en: Instead of saying that, I figured I'd show you.
translation.es: Y te lo quiero mostrar con acciones.

translation.en: -Before you say anything-- -Look at that.
He took his sunglasses off.
He wants you to see him. He likes you.
translation.es: Quiere que lo veas. Le gustaste.

translation.en: Julian, come here.
Come here, pal.
Vanessa...
...I want you to meet Julian, my son.
Our son. I adopted him.
I don't know what to say.
Don't say anything.
Is someone in the bathroom?
Why is the door shut?
-I don't know. -You don't?
-I don't know. -Sonny.
I can't believe this.
-Hey. Open up. -Sonny.
Hello. Open the door!
-Is everything okay? -Oh, my God.
I'm sorry. I was freaking out there.
translation.es: Perdón. Se me botó una canica.

translation.en: -I'm Sonny. -Sid.
I had an attack of paranoia. I thought you were sleeping with my girl.
translation.es: Me entró la paranoia. Pensé que eras amante de mi novia.

translation.en: I am.
What's that?
I am.
That's what I was trying to tell you before. I found someone.
translation.es: Eso es lo que te quería decir antes. Conocí a alguien.

translation.en: -This old guy? -Sid.
He's already achieved so much...
...and yet he's still goal-oriented and still focused.
And he has a five-year plan.
What is it? "Don't die"?
I can't believe this. We got a family now. This is what you wanted.
translation.es: No lo puedo creer. Ya tenemos una familia. ¿No era lo que querías?

translation.en: You surprising me with a kid that you adopted...
translation.es: Que me sorprendieras con un hijo adoptivo...

translation.en: -...wasn't what I wanted. -I did this for you.
translation.es: -...no era lo que quería. -Lo hice por ti.

translation.en: You wanted me to be more responsible. I can't raise this kid alone.
translation.es: Querías que fuera más responsable. Yo no puedo criarlo solo.

translation.en: You remind me of my grandson. You don't think things through.
translation.es: Me recuerdas a mi nieto mayor. No piensas bien las cosas.

translation.en: Hey, Old Man River, zip it or I'll break your hip.
translation.es: Oye, Viejo y el Mar, cállate o te rompo la cadera.

translation.en: -I'd like to see you try it. -Shut up.
How'd you misconstrue the situation so badly?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puedes mal interpretar tanto una situación?

translation.en: I don't know.
Deep down you must've known this day was coming.
translation.es: Has de haber intuido que se acercaba este día.

translation.en: You made the biggest mistake of your life.
translation.es: Cometiste el error más grande de tu vida.

translation.en: I know you'll be missing me when you got...
translation.es: Sé que me extrañarás cuando tengas...

translation.en: ...that big, white, wrinkly...
...body on top of you...
...with his loose skin...
...and old balls.
Gross.
Excuse me. How you doing? I'm Kevin Gerrity.
translation.es: Disculpa. ¿Cómo está? Yo soy Kevin Gerrity.

translation.en: I got an emergency problem. Is Arthur Brooks around?
translation.es: Tengo un problema con el niño. ¿Está Arthur Brooks?

translation.en: I'll go get him for you.
Stay where I can see you. I gotta talk to this guy.
translation.es: Siéntate ahí, quédate quieto. Necesito hablar con este tipo.

translation.en: Mr. Gerrity?
-Arthur Brooks. -How are you? I need to speak with you.
translation.es: -Hola, Arthur Brooks. -¿Cómo está? Necesito hablar con Ud.

translation.en: I didn't tell you to come here, did I?
I was gonna mail you the paperwork.
translation.es: Le iba a mandar los papeles por correo.

translation.en: It's like the opposite of that.
Look, I can't manage this kid.
translation.es: No puedo arreglármelas con este niño.

translation.en: I ain't a good father. I made a big mistake.
translation.es: No soy un buen papá. Cometí un grave error.

translation.en: -Mistake? -I had a mother lined up for him...
...but she's banging the Pepperidge Farm guy.
translation.es: ...se está tirando al viejo de Kentucky Fried Chicken.

translation.en: The kid won't stop peeing and throwing up.
translation.es: Y el niño no deja de orinarse y vomitar.

translation.en: He's like a cocker spaniel. I just....
He'd be better off with his natural mother.
translation.es: Le va a ir mejor con su madre natural.

translation.en: Well, she passed away last night, Mr. Gerrity.
translation.es: Pues, su madre nos dejó anoche, Sr. Gerrity.

translation.en: She had cancer. She must have sensed... ...that her time was running short.
translation.es: Tenía cáncer. Debe de haber sentido que se le acababa el tiempo.

translation.en: She wanted her son to be with the natural father.
translation.es: Quería que su hijo estuviera con su padre.

translation.en: Loop.
Pull.
If you don't wanna take care of him...
translation.es: Si no quiere encargarse de Julián...

translation.en: ...we'll take him. But he'll have to chill in a group home.
translation.es: ...nos encargamos. Pero tendrá que estar un rato en una casa común.

translation.en: Group home? Like an orphanage?
We don't call them that.
translation.es: Sí. Ya no les llamamos así.

translation.en: Look, I did it. Loop, swoop and pull.
translation.es: Mira, lo hice. Doblar, enrollar, jalar.

translation.en: You did do it.
Congratulations, kid.
I showed him that.
Why don't you go back over there, okay?
-I'll call the Heatherton Home-- -Let's do this.
I'll hang on to the kid until you find him a new family.
translation.es: Yo me quedo con el chico hasta que tenga una familia.

translation.en: I don't know. I gotta watch out for the kid's best interest.
translation.es: No sé. Yo tengo que cuidar del bienestar del niño.

translation.en: You said yourself you were a bogus dad.
translation.es: Dijo Ud. que como papá era un fracaso.

translation.en: He's better off with me than in an orphanage.
translation.es: Pero soy mejor que un orfelinato.

translation.en: I don't wanna put him in a home any more than you do.
translation.es: Yo no quiero mandarlo allá más que usted.

translation.en: Why don't we pretend you didn't even come in here?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no fingimos que ni vino hoy?

translation.en: I'll give you a shout when I line up a family.
translation.es: Le echaré un grito cuando tenga una familia.

translation.en: -That's good. -Later.
Just don't make me regret this.
Where are we going now?
I gotta make a phone call. Just stay right here, all right?
translation.es: Necesito hacer una llamada. Nada más quédate aquí, ¿sí?

translation.en: -This is a collect call from: -Your baby boy.
translation.es: -Ésta es una llamada por cobrar de: -Tu hijo chico.

translation.en: -To accept charges, say, "Yes." -Yeah, I'll accept.
translation.es: -Si la acepta, diga sí. -Sí, la acepto.

translation.en: Dad, how's it going? How's Florida?
Not too bad. Your mother got a sunburn playing tennis.
translation.es: Más o menos. Tu mamá se quemó mucho jugando tenis ayer.

translation.en: -I got some interesting news. -Oh, yeah? What?
Kind of adopted a kid.
What do you mean?
I'm talking about you being a grandfather.
Who the hell would give you a kid?
Social Services.
You idiot. You better give that kid back.
translation.es: Idiota. Más vale que devuelvas a ese niño.

translation.en: His mother's....
Hang on.
Go play with them pigeons, buddy.
translation.es: Ve a jugar con las palomas, camarada.

translation.en: I tried to give him back. I just can't. All right?
translation.es: Traté de devolverlo, pero no puedo, ¿está bien?

translation.en: I need your help.
I'm in a bad way. Vanessa dumped me. I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.es: Estoy frito. Vanessa me dejó. No sé qué estoy haciendo.

translation.en: You're damn right.
The kid is always around.
translation.es: El niño no se me despega.

translation.en: He never leaves me alone.
translation.es: En 3 días, no me ha dejado en paz.

translation.en: You'd think he'd want some privacy. I'm in deep shit.
translation.es: No le interesa estar solo. Estoy en un gran lío.

translation.en: Give that kid back before you ruin both your lives.
translation.es: Devuelve al niño o arruinará tu vida y la suya.

translation.en: I appreciate that.
He's better off living in a dumpster.
translation.es: Le iría mejor viviendo en un basurero.

translation.en: I'll be a better father than you!
Impossible! All you care about is yourself!
translation.es: ¡Imposible, lo único que te importa eres tú!

translation.en: Yeah? No, I care about you saving money on this call!
translation.es: ¿Sí? ¡Pues me importa que ahorres dinero en esta llamada!

translation.en: Let's eat.
The Vanessa thing did not work out.
translation.es: La cosa de Vanessa no salió bien.

translation.en: She lost her damn mind. That wasn't your fault, though, okay?
translation.es: Se volvió loca. Pero eso no fue culpa tuya, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: I know when you first got here... ...you thought you were gonna meet your dad.
translation.es: Ya sé que cuando llegaste pensabas que ibas a conocer a tu papá.

translation.en: But I don't think that's gonna happen.
translation.es: Pero creo que eso no va a suceder.

translation.en: -Why? -I don't know.
But, buddy, real dads aren't always that great.
translation.es: Pero mira, no todos los papás de verdad son una maravilla.

translation.en: I got one and he's out of his mind.
translation.es: Al mío le falta un tornillo.

translation.en: He tells me what to do. He never lets me figure stuff out on my own.
translation.es: Me dice qué hacer. Nunca me deja averiguar mis propias soluciones.

translation.en: A lot of dads are like that. That's why people grow up nuts.
translation.es: Muchos papás son así. Por eso tantos adultos están locos.

translation.en: Look at this guy.
He was probably a nice boy like you. Then his dad messed his mind up.
translation.es: Ha de haber sido un niño bueno como tú, y su papá lo arruinó.

translation.en: Who won the Jets game?
Who cares?
Let it go. He can't control you anymore.
translation.es: Lo pasado, pasado. Ya no te controla.

translation.en: What do you mean?
-You know. -You're a loser.
translation.es: Tú bien lo sabes. Eres un fracasado.

translation.en: You're mad at your dad, not at me! I forgive you!
translation.es: ¡Estás enojado con tu papá, no conmigo! ¡Yo te perdono!

translation.en: I am. I am. I hate my father.
translation.es: Es cierto. Es cierto. Odio a mi padre.

translation.en: I don't want it to be like that. I don't wanna control you.
translation.es: No quiero ser así contigo. No quiero controlarte, Julián.

translation.en: -You even like your name? -I guess.
translation.es: ¿Te gusta tu nombre, Julián? Supongo que sí.

translation.en: You guess? Shouldn't you like your name?
It'll be your name the rest of your life.
translation.es: Escoge tú un nombre. Lo tendrás toda tu vida.

translation.en: What do you want?
Frankenstein.
I can deal with that. I'll call you Frankenstein.
translation.es: ¿Frankenstein? Es aceptable. Así te voy a llamar.

translation.en: Frankenstein, you gonna play in the puddle?
translation.es: Frankenstein, ¿vas a jugar en el charco?

translation.en: Go ahead. From now on, you do whatever you wanna do.
translation.es: Ve. De ahora en adelante, haz lo que quieras.

translation.en: I'll show you some cool shit along the way.
translation.es: Y yo te iré enseñando unos trucos.

translation.en: That's what it's all about.
Stay in front of it. Don't be scared.
translation.es: Quédate enfrente de ella, no le temas.

translation.en: It's coming right at you.
You're picking your head up. Don't do that.
translation.es: Estás levantando la cabeza. No hagas eso.

translation.en: That's what you wanna wear?
That's okay with me then.
Good luck walking down the street.
translation.es: Pero te lo advierto, buena suerte en la calle.

translation.en: Way to block it. Stay with it.
translation.es: Así se bloquea. A lo que sigue.

translation.en: You're the next Willie Randolph.
Chief Jay Strongbow used to do a sleeper hold.
translation.es: El Jefe Jay Arcofuerte solía hacer esta llave.

translation.en: Put your arm under here.
Lift this arm, okay? Slide under and try to lock wrists.
translation.es: Levanta este brazo, ¿sí? Deslízate por abajo y junta las muñecas.

translation.en: Let me show you. Watch.
Throw him into the ropes and he comes back....
translation.es: Lo arrojas a las cuerdas, él regresa y...

translation.en: Get him. Get him. Lock him up.
translation.es: Lo agarras. Lo agarras. Le aplicas la llave.

translation.en: Lock wrists.
You bring him down slow.
Apply pressure.
He's going to sleep now.
translation.es: Y se va a echar una siesta.

translation.en: See, he's out.
Wake up.
You'll be the only kid your age with a slingshot.
translation.es: Serás el único niño de tu edad con un tirachinas.

translation.en: Go have some fun. Shoot a few beer cans or something.
translation.es: Ve y diviértete. Tírale a unas latas de cerveza, ¿sí?

translation.en: You like that?
Sonny, Sonny, come here!
What is it? What's the matter?
Let me have that.
Go to your room. I think. Or do whatever you want.
translation.es: Vete a tu cuarto. ¿O no? Ve a hacer lo que quieras.

translation.en: It's gonna be fun. You nervous?
No? You're excited, aren't you?

The peanuts belonged to a squirrel...

translation.en: And then the rabbit thought to himself...
..."Carrots, peanuts, what's the difference?"
So he asked the squirrel if he could have some.
