Julian has been displaying some odd behavior.
translation.es: Julián ha exhibido un comportamiento extraño.

translation.en: He spilled glue on the floor and didn't tell anyone.
translation.es: La semana pasada derramó goma en el piso y no le dijo a nadie.

translation.en: He covered it with newspaper.
And then one of our students wore Rollerblades for show-and-tell.
translation.es: Y luego un estudiante se puso patines para enseñar y contar.

translation.en: And Julian tripped him with a stick.
translation.es: Y Julián hizo que se cayera con un palo.

translation.en: Julian found it hilarious.
I like him to express himself freely.
translation.es: Me gusta que se pueda expresar libremente.

translation.en: I've really never seen any problems with that.
translation.es: Nunca he visto ningún problema con eso.

translation.en: Your boy's making the least progress of any of the children.
translation.es: Su chico es el que menos progreso hace en la clase.

translation.en: Frankly, his personal hygiene is becoming a cause for concern.
translation.es: Y francamente, su higiene personal me está empezando a preocupar.

translation.en: He's the smelly kid in class? I let him become the smelly kid?
translation.es: ¿Es el chico apestoso de la clase? ¿Por mi culpa?

translation.en: What's wrong with me?
I've had some smelly ones before.
translation.es: Sí, ya he tenido unos apestosos.

translation.en: But your son is by far the smelliest.
translation.es: Pero su hijo les gana por mucho.

translation.en: All right, I got you. What do you think I should do?
translation.es: Bueno, entiendo. ¿Qué cree que debo hacer?

translation.en: Start by paying more attention to his schoolwork.
translation.es: Empiece por ponerle más atención a sus tareas.

translation.en: The class is giving a presentation of the Founding Fathers.
translation.es: La clase dará una presentación sobre los Padres de la Patria.

translation.en: Julian has drawn the part of Benjamin Franklin, a very important role.
translation.es: Julián sacó el papel de Benjamín Franklin, un papel muy importante.

translation.en: Do what you can to help.
I will turn this all around. That's a promise.
translation.es: Bueno, Julián va a cambiar. Se lo prometo.

translation.en: Thank you very much.
Stinky, let's go. You got us in trouble.
translation.es: Vámonos, apestosito. Nos metiste en problemas.

translation.en: Wow, I didn't know this about George Washington.
translation.es: Yo no sabía esto de George Washington.

translation.en: Yes, his teeth were made of wool.
Wood.
I sorry. I mix up "D" and "L."
translation.es: Perdón, confundo la eme con la ele.

translation.en: Well, get it right.
Turn that game off, pal.
I got four guys left.
Let's study a little bit.
I don't wanna study.
Give me that.
-You just killed me. -So what? You'll play later.
You can't tell me what to do.
Really? Let's take a vote. Who thinks the kid should study?
translation.es: ¿Que no? Votemos. ¿Quién piensa que el niño debe estudiar?

translation.en: Who doesn't? Well, you just lost, two to one.
translation.es: ¿Quién no? Pues acabas de perder, dos contra uno.

translation.en: It's a tie. That guy doesn't count. He can't even read.
translation.es: No, es un empate. Ese tipo no cuenta, no sabe ni leer.

translation.en: I know. He was just joking around.
translation.es: Ya lo sé. Sólo estaba bromeando.

translation.en: Can you hang out here a little bit? I gotta go do something.
translation.es: Espérame un momento. Necesito hacer algo.

translation.en: No problem.
Would you like
We'll hop, hop, hop, hop
What do you say?
Get the door.
Hi, Julian. How you doing?
I'm Scuba Sam.
Scuba Steve's father.
You see, my boy...
...needs to take a bath.
The only problem is...
...he's afraid to bathe alone.
So I was wondering...
...if maybe you could keep him company in the tub.
translation.es: ...si quizá le podrías hacer compañía en la tina.

translation.en: Terrific. And after the bath, you have to try and study hard.
translation.es: ¡Fantástico! Y después del baño tienes que tratar de estudiar.

translation.en: Because if you wanna be a member of the Scuba Squad... ...you have to be smart.
translation.es: Porque para ser miembro del Escuadrón de Buzos, hay que ser listo.

translation.en: I could be in the Scuba Squad?
translation.es: ¿Yo puedo entrar al Escuadrón de Buzos?

translation.en: Well, sure. All you have to do is work hard.
translation.es: Pues, claro que sí. Sólo necesitas trabajar duro.

translation.en: And don't tell a soul about the Scuba Squad...
translation.es: Y no le cuentes a nadie lo del Escuadrón de Buzos...

translation.en: ...because then everybody will wanna join.
And one more thing...
...be nice to the delivery guy, would you?
It's not his fault he can't read.
translation.es: No es culpa suya no saber leer.

translation.en: Take care.
He told me to watch his boat for him. Said that he wanted to...
translation.es: Me dijo que le cuidara su barco. Me dijo que...

translation.en: ...talk to you about some secret mission.
translation.es: ...quería hablar contigo de una misión secreta.

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.es: No tengo idea de qué estás hablando.

translation.en: How come I have to wear a bathing suit?
translation.es: ¿Por qué necesito usar traje de baño?

translation.en: I don't know the rules...
...with little kids and grownups and being naked and just sit down.
translation.es: ...de niños y adultos y estar desnudo y... nada más siéntate.

translation.en: The good news is you're not smelling like a foot anymore.
translation.es: La buena noticia es que ya no hueles a pie.

translation.en: I read something interesting. You know Benjamin Franklin invented...
translation.es: Hoy leí que Benjamín Franklin inventó...

translation.en: ...bifocals? That's pretty cool.
What are they?
I'll show you in that book. It might help you out with your school play.
translation.es: Te voy a enseñar en el libro. Quizá te ayude para tu obra.

translation.en: We'll make this a regular thing.
translation.es: Esto ya va a ser habitual.

translation.en: Bathing and studying and eating right.
translation.es: Bañarte y estudiar y comer bien.

translation.en: Put your head back. My grandmother did this to me.
translation.es: Inclina la cabeza. Esto me hacía mi abuelita.

translation.en: "Oh, boy. When I was a little girl, frankfurters only cost a nickel."
translation.es: Dios mío, cuando yo era niña, las salchichas costaban sólo 5 centavos.

translation.en: Can you still have fun?
Yeah, but after you study.
In fact, we gotta get you dressing differently.
translation.es: Es más, te tenemos que vestir diferente.

translation.en: -We'll go to Barney's. -Barney?
Not that Barney. A more expensive Barney.
translation.es: No a ése, a otro Barney. A un Barney más caro.

translation.en: All right, one at a time.
That's one.
Two.
See? Urinals are good too.
"Electricity."
Very good.
"Constitution."
That's it.
"Philadelphia."
Smart. Good.
"Fish"?
"Hip--"
"Hipopynonamous"?
Damn you! You gave him the easy ones!
translation.es: ¡Maldito seas! ¡Le diste a él las fáciles!

translation.en: Slow down.
-You owe me a Sausage McMuffin. -Okay.
There's a pole there.
My name is Alexander Hamilton.
I was the first Secretary of the Treasury.
translation.es: Yo fui el primer Secretario de la Tesorería.

translation.en: I owned a bank and a newspaper.
translation.es: Yo tenía un banco y un diario.

translation.en: Aaron Bird shot me.
Hi, my name is Benjamin Franklin.
translation.es: Hola, yo me llamo Benjamín Franklin.

translation.en: I was a writer, a diplomat...
...an inventor and a statesman...
...although I only went to school for two years.
translation.es: ...aunque sólo fui dos años a la escuela.

translation.en: I wrote many books and invented many things we still use today.
translation.es: Escribí muchos libros e inventé muchas cosas que aún usamos.

translation.en: The Declaration of Independence is finished.
translation.es: Ya está terminada la Declaración de Independencia.

translation.en: Who will be the first to sign?
-How about you, John Hancock? -I want to sign!
translation.es: -¿Qué tal tú, John Hancock? -¡Yo quiero firmar!

translation.en: -Look at my man stand strong. -He's so cute.
translation.es: -Mira a mi hombrecito, bien parado. -Es adorable.

translation.en: What are your cards?
I got a six, a five, a jack, a four and a eight.
translation.es: Tengo un 6, un 5, una sota, un 4 y un 8.

translation.en: -I win. -What do you mean?
I had a hand just like that. I didn't win.
translation.es: Yo tenía una mano como ésa. Y no gané.

translation.en: -Because I win. -This is bullshit!
All right. Take it easy, man.
Every time it's different cards.
translation.es: Con las cartas que sean, él gana.

translation.en: So what? Relax. He's a kid.
There should be same set of rules, no matter what age.
translation.es: Debería haber las mismas reglas para todos, grandes y chicos.

translation.en: He's gotta learn how to lose too.
translation.es: También tiene que aprender a perder.

translation.en: -Hello, Mr. Koufax. -Mr. Brooks, how you doing?
I was gonna give you a buzz.
translation.es: Le iba a llamar por teléfono.

translation.en: You just called me Mr. Koufax, didn't you?
translation.es: Pero me acaba de llamar Sr. Koufax, ¿verdad?

translation.en: It is your name, isn't it? Sonny Koufax?
You held yourself out to be Kevin Gerrity...
...to gain custody of young Julian.
Big problem in this state.
I've delivered to you before.
You always order three pieces of cheesecake.
translation.es: Siempre pide tres pastelitos de queso.

translation.en: The real Kevin Gerrity asked me to take care of--
translation.es: El verdadero Kevin Gerrity me llamó y me pidió--

translation.en: Save it, Mr. Koufax.
He has to come with me or I'll arrest you.
translation.es: El niño viene conmigo o lo hago arrestar a Ud.

translation.en: Take out your handcuffs.
I don't have any, but two policemen downstairs do.
translation.es: Yo no tengo, pero los dos policías de abajo sí.

translation.en: Listen, Sonny, I would like to help...
...but my status in your country is not what you would call legal.
translation.es: ...mi situación en tu país no es lo que se puede decir legal.

translation.en: It's okay.
Julian, you're gonna have to come with me.
translation.es: Julián, vas a tener que venir conmigo.

translation.en: One second, pal.
Would you just give me a second to say goodbye to the kid?
translation.es: Déme un segundo, por favor, para despedirme del niño.

translation.en: Take a second.
You don't want me here anymore?
No, that's not it, pal.
translation.es: No, ése no es el problema.

translation.en: You just gotta go away for a little while.
translation.es: Nada más te tienes que ir un tiempo.

translation.en: How long am I going away for?
I don't wanna lie to you.
I don't think we're gonna...
...be seeing each other anymore.
I screwed up, pal. I'm so sorry.
translation.es: Metí la pata, amigo. Lo siento mucho.

translation.en: Come here.
Put your coat on.
It's not your fault, okay? I'm the idiot.
translation.es: No es tu culpa, ¿eh? Yo soy el idiota.

translation.en: -I don't wanna go. -I know you don't.
But you have to, and you're gonna be okay.
translation.es: Pero te tienes que ir y todo saldrá bien.

translation.en: Please don't make me go.
translation.es: Por favor no hagas que me vaya.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I don't know what else to do.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero no sé qué otra cosa hacer.

translation.en: I won't play the kangaroo song anymore.
translation.es: Ya no voy a poner la canción del canguro.

translation.en: Come on.
Just go. You gotta go.
translation.es: Nada más vete. Te tienes que ir.

translation.en: You gotta go.
I don't wanna go. I promise...
translation.es: No me quiero ir. Te lo juro...

translation.en: ...I'm sorry. I don't even like that song anymore.
translation.es: ...perdóname. Ya ni me gusta esa canción.

translation.en: I know, pal. That's not it.
translation.es: Ya lo sé, amigo. No es eso.

translation.en: But I wipe my own ass! I wipe my own ass!
translation.es: ¡Pero ya me limpio el culito solo! ¡Me limpio yo solo!

translation.en: I know.
-Layla, they took the kid. -Who?
Social Services. I gotta get him back.
You said this was just temporary.
translation.es: Pero si era una cosa temporal.

translation.en: I can't have it be temporary. It's gotta be permanent.
translation.es: No puede ser temporal, necesito que sea permanente.

translation.en: Okay, what can we do?
I filed to get custody based on the child's best interests.
translation.es: Hice una petición de custodia acorde con los intereses del niño.

translation.en: Tommy knew a clerk, so they fast-tracked the hearing. It's Tuesday.
translation.es: Y Tommy logró que me dieran audiencia pronto. Es el martes. Ven.

translation.en: -This Tuesday? -You got work?
I gotta go to Washington for a hearing to dismiss my case.
translation.es: Tengo que ir a Washington. Quieren desechar mi caso.

translation.en: Can you get somebody else?
I'm sorry, Sonny. I can't. It's my case.
translation.es: Discúlpame, Sonny. No puedo. Es mi caso.

translation.en: We don't even know where this kid's gonna end up.
translation.es: ¿Y el caso de Julián? No sabemos dónde acabará ese niño.

translation.en: Sonny, this is exactly why I didn't wanna get involved.
translation.es: Sonny, por esto precisamente no quería tener una relación.

translation.en: I had things going the way I wanted.
translation.es: Las cosas iban como yo quería.

translation.en: Then at the park, you and this kid come barging into my life...
translation.es: Luego estoy en el parque y Uds. irrumpen en mi vida...

translation.en: ...and it's screwing up everything I had planned.
translation.es: ...y están echando a perder todos mis planes.

translation.en: You think I planned on a kid showing up on my doorstep?
translation.es: Un niño llegó a mi puerta. ¿Lo tenía planeado?

translation.en: But I fell in love with him.
So now my plans have changed.
All rise.
We're here to determine proper custody of Julian McGrath...
translation.es: Estamos aquí para determinar la custodia de Julián McGrath...

translation.en: ...also known as Julian Gerrity, a minor child.
translation.es: ...también conocido como Julián Gerrity, menor de edad.

translation.en: Representing New York City?
Ted Castellucci.
Arthur Brooks, Social Services.
And representing Sonny Koufax?
Phillip D'Amato.
Thomas Grayton.
Plus, I'll pretty much be representing myself.
Anyone else?
Layla Maloney, Your Honor.
-Thank you. -Does this mean that you love me?
Something like that.
First witness.
Koufax is a good egg. He was nice to that kid.
translation.es: Koufax es buen tipo, trató bien al niño.

translation.en: But he fights like a girl. You like that?
translation.es: Pero pelea como niña. ¿Te gustó eso?

translation.en: I'm right here, miss.
What are you gonna do about it?
Are you drunk, Mr. Herlihy?
I had a few chardonnays. What of it?
translation.es: Me tomé unas copas de Chardonnay. ¿Y qué tiene?

translation.en: Get off the stand.
You got it.
I've got a few problems.
Off to a good start.
Mr. Koufax is a really cool guy. I wish my dad was as cool as him.
translation.es: El Sr. Koufax es un tipo súper. Ojalá mi papá fuera tan bueno como él.

translation.en: My dad was a military man.
Guess I wasn't such a "good soldier."
translation.es: Supongo que yo no fui un buen soldado.

translation.en: When I was 35, he attempted to give me a crew cut while I was sleeping.
translation.es: Una tarde, estando yo dormido, trató de raparme la cabeza.

translation.en: I broke his arm, haven't seen him since.
translation.es: Me desperté, le rompí un brazo y lo dejé de ver.

translation.en: I'd rather live on the streets than under his rules.
translation.es: Prefiero vivir en la calle que con sus reglas dementes.

translation.en: Anyway, I think Mr. Koufax should be acquitted of all the charges.
translation.es: Yo creo que el Sr. Koufax debe ser absuelto de todos los cargos.

translation.en: If O.J. can get away with murder, why can't Sonny have his kid?
translation.es: Si O.J. puede asesinar impunemente, ¿por qué no puede Sonny ser papá?

translation.en: This guy knows what I'm talking about.
translation.es: Él sabe de lo que hablo.

translation.en: No more questions.
How long have you delivered food to Mr. Koufax?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto tiempo lleva entregándole comida al Sr. Koufax?

translation.en: I deliver food for six years.
Plus, I'm stripper. But I've put on weight so it's problem.
translation.es: Además, soy desnudista. Pero gané peso y es problema.

translation.en: I see. And in your experience, was Sonny a good father to Julian?
translation.es: Ya veo. Y en su opinión, ¿Sonny fue buen padre para Julián?

translation.en: Oh, yes. They make terrific pair.
translation.es: Ah, sí. Hacen una pareja fantástica.

translation.en: They went together like lamb and tuna fish.
translation.es: Van juntos como carne de cordero y atún.

translation.en: Lamb and tuna fish?
Spaghetti and meatball? You more comfortable with that analogy?
translation.es: ¿Espagueti y bolas de carne? ¿Gusta más esa analogía?

translation.en: Yes, considering we're in America.
translation.es: Sí, considerando que estamos en EE.UU.

translation.en: If you don't like spaghetti and meatballs, get out.
translation.es: Si no te gusta el espagueti con albóndigas, vete.

translation.en: I'll come give you a crew cut.
Let's see your clippers.
Not my problem your dad was sick.
translation.es: No es mi problema que su papá fuera loco.

translation.en: Stop yelling at me!
Order! Order! Order!
Am I in the right room?
Who the hell are you?
I'm Mr. Koufax's co-counsel.
He has enough co-counsels.
Well...
...one more won't hurt.
Let's get on with it.
Mr. Koufax is simply parading his buddies up there.
translation.es: El Sr. Koufax sólo está pasando a todos sus amigos.

translation.en: Can't they find someone who isn't a friend?
translation.es: ¿No tienen a alguien que no sea su amigo?

translation.en: What were Julian and Mr. Koufax doing?
translation.es: ¿Y qué hacían Julián y el Sr. Koufax?

translation.en: Shopping.
Did he appear to be an attentive, loving father?
translation.es: ¿Y el Sr. Koufax parecía ser atento y cariñoso?

translation.en: He certainly did.
And how long have you disliked Mr. Koufax?
translation.es: ¿Y desde cuándo le cae mal el Sr. Koufax?

translation.en: Since the day I met him.
For the record, where did you work during medical school?
translation.es: ¿Y dónde trabajó Ud. mientras estudiaba medicina?

translation.en: Hooters.
No further questions.
Asshole.
Next witness.
We'd like to call Julian McGrath.
If it's okay with you, I'd like to ask you a few questions.
translation.es: Si estás de acuerdo, quisiera hacerte unas preguntas.

translation.en: This is just you and me talking...
...so don't pay attention to these people.
translation.es: ...así que ni te fijes en esa gente.

translation.en: Can you tell me how old you are?
Your Honor, one second.
That's better, huh?
Can you tell me how old you are?
Five.
What's your birthday?
July 15th.
Where were you born?
Toronto.
Toronto? I thought you were from Buffalo.
translation.es: ¿Toronto? Yo creía que eras de Búfalo.

translation.en: I moved to Buffalo with my mommy.
translation.es: Me mudé a Búfalo con mi mami.

translation.en: For the past six weeks, you've been living with Sonny?
translation.es: Y las últimas 6 semanas has vivido con Sonny, ¿no?

translation.en: -Did you and Sonny have fun? -Yes.
What kind of things would you do?
He taught me how to do the sleeper hold like Chief Jay Strongbow.
translation.es: Me enseñó la llave que hacía el Jefe Jay Arcofuerte.

translation.en: That's nice.
Anything else?
He taught me how to pee on a building.
translation.es: Me enseñó a hacer pipí sobre un edificio.

translation.en: Really?
And he taught me that Styx was one of the greatest American rock bands.
translation.es: Y me enseñó que Styx es una de las grandes bandas de rock.

translation.en: They only caught a bad rap...
translation.es: Pero les fue de la patada...

translation.en: ...because most critics are cynical assholes.
translation.es: ...porque la mayoría de los críticos son unos hijos de puta cínicos.

translation.en: I think we'd all agree with that.
translation.es: Creo que nadie puede disputarte eso.

translation.en: Before you came here, do you remember... ...the last thing your mommy said to you?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas lo último que te dijo tu mami?

translation.en: That she loved me and I was gonna live with my new daddy.
translation.es: Que me quería mucho y que iba yo a vivir con mi nuevo papi.

translation.en: If your mother could pick anyone to be your new daddy...
translation.es: Y si tu mamá pudiera escoger al papá ideal...

translation.en: ...who would she pick?
Sonny.
Thank you, Julian.
You can step down now.
That went good, don't you think?
I don't know. Judge doesn't look too happy.
translation.es: No sé. La jueza no se ve muy contenta.

translation.en: Mr. Koufax, anyone else?
I'd like to call upon myself, Your Honor.
Awesome.
Which of your esteemed co-counsels will examine you?
translation.es: ¿Y cuál de sus estimados colegas lo interrogará?

translation.en: My father, Lenny Koufax.
What?
Forget it, Sonny.
What is going on?
Nobody in this world thinks I shouldn't have a child more than that man.
translation.es: Nadie está más convencido de que no debería tener un hijo que él.

translation.en: He also happens to be a well-respected lawyer in Florida.
translation.es: También sucede que es un abogado muy respetado en Florida.

translation.en: If I can make a believer out of him, I can make a believer out of everybody.
translation.es: Así que si lo convenzo a él puedo convencer a todos los presentes.

translation.en: This court is after the truth, not the opinion of the defendant's father.
translation.es: Protesto. Esta corte busca la verdad, no la opinión de su padre.

translation.en: You want my opinion? My son is a moron.
translation.es: ¿Quieren mi opinión? Mi hijo es un idiota.

translation.en: I withdraw my objection. Please proceed.
This is a big mistake.
translation.es: Éste es un error grave, Sonny.

translation.en: I only came today to make sure you didn't end up in jail.
translation.es: Yo sólo vine para asegurarme de que no acabes en la cárcel por esto.

translation.en: That was nice of you. Thank you.
translation.es: Fue amable de tu parte. Gracias.

translation.en: To do what I think is right here.
Cut your fingernails. They're too long.
translation.es: Cuando esto acabe, córtate las uñas. Están largas.

translation.en: This case is simple.
It is absurd to think that Sonny Koufax is ready to raise a child.
translation.es: Es absurdo pensar que Sonny Koufax está listo para criar un hijo.

translation.en: -Objection! -Shut up, Tommy.
Sorry, Mr. Koufax.
First of all, how did...
...this sweet little boy, Julian, end up under your supervision?
translation.es: ...¿cómo acabó este lindo niño Julián, bajo tu supervisión?

translation.en: I told Social Services that my name was Kevin Gerrity.
translation.es: Le dije a Servicios Sociales que yo era Kevin Gerrity.

translation.en: -Of course, you are not Kevin Gerrity. -No.
translation.es: Y claro que no eres Kevin Gerrity.

translation.en: -So you lied. -Yes.
Like the time I found a bag of pot in your drawer...
translation.es: Como cuando encontré marihuana entre tus calzones y dijiste...

translation.en: ...and you said you thought they were pencil shavings.
translation.es: ...que creías que eran virutas de lápices.

translation.en: Remember when I told you Aunt Fay was coming to New York...
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando te dije que tu tía Fay iba a venir...

translation.en: ...and I wanted you to show her the city?
translation.es: ...y quería que le enseñaras Nueva York?

translation.en: And you said that you had better things to do.
translation.es: ¿Y dijiste que tenías cosas mejores que hacer?

translation.en: That's right.
I'm curious. Just what were those better things that you had to do?
translation.es: Tengo curiosidad. ¿Exactamente cuáles eran esas cosas mejores?

translation.en: Jethro Tull had a reunion concert in New Jersey, so I caught that.
translation.es: Jethro Tull tenía un concierto de reunión en Nueva Jersey y fui.

translation.en: What happened to Aunt Fay that weekend?
translation.es: ¿Y qué pasó con tu tía Fay ese fin de semana?

translation.en: She died.
Yes, she did.
Did you happen to make it to her funeral?
-Why not? -I went to Jones Beach...
translation.es: ¿Por qué no? Fui a Playa Jones, me emborraché y me quedé dormido.

translation.en: ...got drunk and fell asleep.
translation.es: Fui a Playa Jones, me emborraché y me quedé dormido.

translation.en: Hell, yes!
Some role model.
Your Honor...
...my son doesn't have health insurance.
He doesn't know how to boil an egg.
translation.es: No sabe ni hacer un huevo duro.

translation.en: He filed for social security at the age of 30.
translation.es: Pidió una pensión al gobierno a los 30 años de edad.

translation.en: He is a drain on the economy, on the country...
translation.es: Es una carga para la economía del país...

translation.en: ...and most of all, on me!
Your Honor, to give this young man...
...custody over another life is not only wrong...
translation.es: ...la custodia de otra vida no sólo está mal...

translation.en: ...it's insane.
Hey. I love you.
-What? -Don't be scared. It's all right.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No tienes que tener miedo. Descuida.

translation.en: I'm not scared.
If I get custody of Julian, I'll be his father forever.
translation.es: Si me dan custodia de Julián, seré su papá para siempre.

translation.en: That scares you because you think there's a good chance I'll fail.
translation.es: Y eso te asusta porque crees que hay probabilidad de que fracase.

translation.en: Sonny, it's more than a chance. It's a certainty.
translation.es: Sonny, son más que probabilidades. Es una certeza.

translation.en: You're wrong, Dad.
You can be scared that I might get pickpocketed in a bad neighborhood...
translation.es: Puedes tener miedo de que me roben mi cartera en un barrio malo o...

translation.en: ...or break my legs skiing.
But don't be scared about me being a dad, because I will not fail.
translation.es: Pero no tengas miedo de que sea papá porque no fracasaré.

translation.en: I love this kid too much.
I love him as much as you love me, Dad.
translation.es: Tanto como tú me quieres, papá.

translation.en: I'm gonna give him advice and I'm gonna guide him...
translation.es: Y lo voy a aconsejar y lo voy a guiar...

translation.en: ...and I'll be there whenever he needs me.
translation.es: ...y lo voy a ayudar cuando me necesite.

translation.en: I'll fly to New York to be at his court case...
translation.es: Volaré a Nueva York a aparecer en su caso...

translation.en: ...even if I disagree with why he's there.
translation.es: ...aun si no estoy de acuerdo en lo que está haciendo.

translation.en: But, Sonny, you work in a tollbooth.
translation.es: Pero, Sonny, trabajas en una caseta de pago.

translation.en: Don't worry about money.
translation.es: No tengas miedo por el dinero.

translation.en: I am in love with a beautiful girl who makes plenty of it.
translation.es: Estoy enamorado de una chica hermosa que gana mucho.

translation.en: She'll be my sugar mama.
I gotta get me one of those.
I know this is the right thing because I would die for this kid...
translation.es: Yo sé que es lo correcto porque yo moriría por ese niño...

translation.en: ...just so he won't feel one ounce of sadness.
translation.es: ...sólo para que no sintiera un gramo de tristeza.

translation.en: That's why you're here right now, to protect me, to be scared for me...
translation.es: Por eso estás aquí, para protegerme, para no dejar que tenga miedo...

translation.en: ...to be a good father.
And that's exactly what I'm gonna be.
translation.es: Y eso es justo lo que voy a ser.

translation.en: Hello, Dad?
Yeah, I just wanted to say I love you.
translation.es: Sí, sólo quería decirte que te quiero.

translation.en: Hi, Mom? Could you put Dad on the phone for a second?
Can I borrow that when you're done?
Your Honor...
...my son deserves this kid.
translation.es: ...mi hijo se merece a ese niño.

translation.en: I love you too, sir.
Mr. Koufax...
...the fact is you kidnapped this child.
translation.es: ...el hecho es que Ud. secuestró a este niño.

translation.en: Not only shouldn't you get custody...
...but since you obtained him by defrauding the state...
...you should be in jail.
Bailiff, remand him until I can figure out the punishment.
translation.es: Alguacil, lléveselo hasta que decida yo el castigo.

translation.en: Wait. You can't take him away.
As that boy's father, I refuse to press charges.
translation.es: Como padre del niño, no levanto cargos.

translation.en: Oh, God. Corinne, I'm sorry.
Six years ago, Joe Carter....
Joe Carter?
Toronto and the Phillies. World Series.
translation.es: Toronto y los Phillies. Serie Mundial.

translation.en: Mitch Williams-- We flew up for the night.
translation.es: Mitch Williams-- Pasamos una noche allí.

translation.en: -There was a girl. -Oh, God.
I'm an idiot. I was so hammered.
Chicken wings, Molson 3-0. Canadian beer is like moonshine.
translation.es: Alas de pollo y cerveza. La canadiense es como whisky.

translation.en: Hell, yes.
You remember? It was at that Toronto Hooters.
translation.es: ¿Te acuerdas, verdad? En el Melones de Toronto.

translation.en: That was before he met you. That Hooters thing is a coincidence.
translation.es: Eso fue antes de conocerte. Lo de Melones es una coincidencia.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Corinne.
I know this changes everything, but I had to do the right thing.
translation.es: Sé que esto cambia todo pero tenía que hacer lo correcto.

translation.en: Mr. Castellucci.
Pending a blood test, I....
translation.es: Pido que se haga una prueba de sangre y...

translation.en: Whatever.
The court grants custody to Kevin Gerrity, pending the DNA test results.
translation.es: Custodia provisional al Sr. Gerrity, hasta la prueba de ADN.

translation.en: I want you to be my dad, Sonny.
translation.es: Quiero que tú seas mi papá, Sonny.

translation.en: I know. I do too, pal.
translation.es: Ya lo sé. Yo también, amigo.

translation.en: But I'm not sure that can happen exactly the way we want it.
translation.es: Pero no estoy seguro que las cosas puedan ser como las deseamos.

translation.en: Because it seems you already have a daddy.
translation.es: Porque parece que ya tienes un papá.

translation.en: But I'll tell you what I can do.
I can be your friend, no matter what. All right?
translation.es: Puedo ser tu amigo pase lo que pase, ¿está bien?

translation.en: I'll always be your friend.
I'll always be your family. I'll always be around.
translation.es: Siempre seré de tu familia y estaré cerca.

translation.en: I promise.
The kid's good at tying his shoes.
translation.es: El niño ya se ata los zapatos.

translation.en: He's not great at it, so work with him.
translation.es: Pero no muy bien, así que ayúdale.

translation.en: -I'll teach him bunny ears. -What's bunny ears?
translation.es: -Le enseño las orejas de conejo. -¿Qué es eso?

translation.en: Make bunny ears, cross and pull them through.
translation.es: Haces las orejas, las cruzas y por abajo.

translation.en: I go with this loop, swoop and pull thing. He likes that.
translation.es: Yo hago lo de doblar, enrollar y jalar.

translation.en: -I don't know that. -Go with the loop, swoop and pull.
translation.es: -Lo de las orejas es fácil. -Haz lo mío.

translation.en: I swear to God it's working.
Go with the bunny ears thing. You're his dad, right? I'm sorry.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Haz lo de las orejas. Tú eres su papá. Perdón.

translation.en: It's important, when you eat at my restaurant...
translation.es: Es importante que en mi restaurante...

translation.en: ...you never order BLT.
You must trust me. Stay away from BLT, okay?
translation.es: Créeme. No toques el de tocino, lechuga y tomate.

translation.en: I'm gonna leave you with your dad now, Julian.
translation.es: Te voy a dejar con tu papá, Julián.

translation.en: He's a good man. I've known him my whole life.
translation.es: Es un buen hombre. Lo conozco de toda la vida.

translation.en: So you two have fun and I'll see you in the morning.
translation.es: Diviértanse y los veré mañana para desayunar.

translation.en: All right?
-Quit scaring the kid for a minute. -Who am I scaring?
translation.es: -Ya deja de espantar al niño. -¿Lo estoy espantando?

translation.en: Bye, pal.
I went to China. Do you know where that is?
It's in Asia, which is...
...by Europe. I brought some cool stuff back.
translation.es: ...junto a Europa. Traje unas cosas súper.

translation.en: Did you move the bench?
That's pretty funny.
You know what I got? Some noisemakers. Check this out.
translation.es: Sabes, traje unas matracas. Mira esto.

translation.en: Wanna try one?
That's my foot!
You're nice man.
I've got Spice Channel. It's blurry but it's nice.
translation.es: En mi casa tengo Canal Caliente. Está borroso pero se ve.

translation.en: Let's make this quick. I gotta get to work.
translation.es: Que sea rápido. Quiero irme a trabajar.

translation.en: Holy shit. Sonny Koufax would rather work than eat.
translation.es: ¿Cómo? Sandy Koufax prefiere trabajar que comer.

translation.en: I'm working on a big case. I gotta sue you for making me come here.
translation.es: Es que es un caso importante, demandarlos a Uds. por traerme acá.

translation.en: Surprise!
Did you just waste the good surprise on me again?
translation.es: ¿Desperdiciaron el grito bueno en mí otra vez?

translation.en: -Happy birthday. -Thanks, everybody.
Happy birthday, Daddy.
How you doing, cutie?
Sonny, I beat you so bad in basketball yesterday.
translation.es: Sonny, te di una paliza ayer en básquetbol.

translation.en: From now on, I have to stop letting you win.
translation.es: Voy a tener que olvidar lo de dejarte ganar.

translation.en: I stopped that months ago. He still wins.
translation.es: Lo olvidé hace 6 meses y sigue ganando.

translation.en: That's because you suck.
Corinne, put a tank top on for old time's sake.
translation.es: Ponte una camisetita por los viejos tiempos.

translation.en: -What is he talking about, Mommy? -Nothing.
-Happy birthday, Sonny. -Thank you.
It's a clock radio.
-Thanks for telling me. -I have to split.
translation.es: -¿Sí? Gracias por decirme. -Me tengo que ir.

translation.en: I got deliveries.
Hang out with us. We'll have fun.
No, I can't stay. I'll hang for a little bit.
translation.es: No puedo. Me quedo unos minutos.

translation.en: There you go. Come on, let's eat, everybody.
translation.es: Eso es. Ven. Vamos a comer, todos.

translation.en: Hey, you! Still missing that tooth, huh?
Can we get some fries?
-Vanessa. -Hi, Sonny.
You're a Hooters girl?
What happened to Sid's five-year plan?
translation.es: ¿Y el plan de 5 años de Sid?

translation.en: How you doing?
-Maybe it's a 10-year plan. -Is that the guy with the old balls?
translation.es: -Quizá sea de 10 años. -¿Él es el de las pelotas viejas?

translation.en: I think it is.
Come on. I bet they're nice.
translation.es: Por favor. Apuesto a que son lindas.

translation.en: You're not supposed to say "balls." Testicles. Okay?
translation.es: Creo que no debes decir pelotas. Testículos.
